selectedVerses.text: You, O king, have made a decree, that every man who hears the sound of the horn, pipe, lyre, trigon, harp, bagpipe, and every kind of music, shall fall down and worship the golden image.
to the music of the lute and the harp, to the melody of the lyre.

Therefore, as soon as all the peoples heard the sound of the horn, pipe, lyre, trigon, harp, bagpipe, and every kind of music, all the peoples, nations, and languages fell down and worshiped the golden image that King Nebuchadnezzar had set up.
who sing idle songs to the sound of the harp and like David invent for themselves instruments of music,
Chenaniah, leader of the Levites in music, should direct the music, for he understood it.
